description: Account Credentials: Login identifiers such as username/password, email address, phone number.
Subcategory: Financial and Transactional Data
Financial Information: Payment/billing data (card, billing address, provider account), credit score/history, purchase records with timestamps/values.
Subcategory: Health and Biometric Data
Biometric: Biometric identifiers (fingerprints, facial/iris patterns) used for identification.
Health Data: Health data: diagnoses, prescriptions, medical history, self‑reported wellness; may include menstrual/reproductive indicators.
Non-sensitive Health Data: Calculated or device-reported wellness measures (e.g., BMI, weight/height, body temperature).
User's Location: Geolocation from GPS, IP, manual input; time zone; mobile network; Wi‑Fi/Bluetooth signals.
Subcategory: Special Category Data
Sexual Orientation: Self-identified or inferred sexual preference.
Political Views: Stated or inferred political beliefs or affiliations.
Ethnic/Racial Origin: Declared or inferred ethnic or racial background.
Trade Union Membership: Association with organized labor (membership/affiliation).
Social Security Number: National identifier used for tax or welfare purposes.
Information Relating to Your Sex Life: Information relating to sex life, including habits, partners, or preferences.
Device Fingerprints: Device/technical identifiers and specs: IP, model, OS, browser; app details; hardware; extensions/plugins; accessibility features; power/battery status.
Subcategory: Behavioral Profiling
Behavioral Profiles: Inferred behavioral profiles predicting traits or preferences.
User Segments: User segments/groups based on interests, spending, demographics, or behaviors.
Subcategory: Psychographics
Inferred Interests or Personality: Inferred interests or personality derived from behavior/interaction patterns.
Name: May refer to first name, surname, or full legal name; may include aliases or display names.
Physical Address: May include street address, city, postal code, and country of residence.
Age: Refers to date of birth (DD/MM/YYYY) or age.
Photo/Profile Picture: Photo/profile picture: facial image or avatar associated with the user.
Gender: May refer to gender identity or biological sex, often selected from predefined options.
Subcategory: Location and Environmental Data
Device Location: Location of the hardware used to access the service (may differ from user’s location).
General Environmental Data: Ambient temperature, humidity, lighting; weather/air quality; safety sensor readings.
Subcategory: Behavioral and Usage Data
User Behavioral Tracking: Activity/behavior tracking: cookies, session counts, ad engagement, resource usage, browsing/search history, page duration, clickstream/URL history.
Usage Data: Operational usage metrics: user counts, error/crash logs, exit methods, clicks/hovers/inputs, navigation paths (referrers/exits).
Subcategory: Activity and Motion Data
User Physical Activity: Motion/activity: steps, speed, distance, accelerometer/gyroscope signals.
Subcategory: Communication and Social Interaction Data
Social Interactions: Social graph/links; interaction metadata (frequency/timing); user-submitted text, audio, images, messages.
Subcategory: Metadata
Metadata: Background metadata about files, activities, communications; hashtags/labels.
Subcategory: Third-Party and Network Data
Third-Party Account Data and Relationship: Accounts from external platforms (e.g., Facebook, Google), social accounts, relationships with third parties.
Subcategory: Device Intelligence
Root object: presence of data types collected about the user
Category: Data Collected
Subcategory: Personal Identification Data
Personal Description: Free-text or structured profile text, e.g., biography or preferences.
Philosophical Beliefs: Spiritual, ethical, or moral convictions.
Category: Security & Auth Data
Subcategory: Security Monitoring
Security Logs: Logs of access attempts, settings changes, unusual user activities; may include session tokens and 2FA attempts.
Category: Inferred Data
Subcategory: Segmentation
